text: Hi! I'm Arif. I am a postdoc at ICTS-TIFR, India where I work on gravitational wave astrophysics and waveform modeling using numerical relativity. I am a member of the LIGO-VIRGO collaboration and also a member of the Simulating eXtreme Spacetime (SXS) collaboration. I am starting to learn more about Julia by using it as the primary language for a course on compact objects <https://github.com/md-arif-shaikh/Physics-Of-Compact-Objects>. Looking forward to enhance my Julia knowledge further.
